thread.section_title: Hudson Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Another person too old for this!
thread.title_full: Another person too old for this! - Review of Hudson Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: omahamom1
title: Another person too old for this!
text: The room isn't small, it's crazy tiny. There is no place to sit except on the bed. You have just inches between the bed and the walk to move around. It's also too dark in the rooms. I had to use the flashlight on my phone to look around for things on the shelves and floor. The hallways are dark with bright green doors. Reminds me of a bad dormitory building. The location is great and Fluffys next door offers great food at a cheap price. The lobby is beautiful and the room was clean. If I was 20 years younger it would have been fine but I'm just past the stage of bad hotel rooms.
